name: One date with a snake boy (ODWSB)
name_original: One date with a snake boy (ODWSB)
description:
This short visual novel will show you one day (or rather evening) of an awkward couple who decided to go out on a date.

If you like the game, then you can support the author by subscribing to her patreon:

https://www.patreon.com/loxushka_40

Or by following her twitter account:

https://twitter.com/Loxushka_40
